yooessentials_access_conditions.label: Rules
yooessentials_access_conditions.description: Create rules to define your condition. You can monitor the status of each rule in the evaluation logs.

yooessentials_access_mode.label: Evaluation Mode
yooessentials_access_mode.description: When multiple rules applied choose AND if all rules should pass, OR for at least one rule to pass, or Custom to write your own query.

yooessentials_access_mode_query.description: To define custom evaluation logic, create a query. Reference each rule within the query using its number enclosed in curly brackets (e.g. {1}). Combine rules using AND and OR operators, and use parentheses to control the order of evaluation (e.g. {1} AND {2}, {1} OR {2}, ({1} AND {2}) OR {3}).
